LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasPrevented: A short circuit was prevented. All overcurrent that occurred was absorbed by the internal mechanism of {0}. Thankfully, there's no noticeable damage.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitRainWasPrevented: A circuit was exposed to rain and nearly shorted; however, since the overcurrent was interrupted by the advanced control mechanism of {0}, it was not damaged.
LanguageData.SCPEffectReductionBatteryPowerLossOnLeak: [{0} effect]\n {1}% reduction of battery loss on leakage.
LanguageData.SCPEffectAbsorptionAllLeakedEnergy: [{0} effect]\n All the released energy of {1} Wd was absorbed.
LanguageData.MustPlaceWithWaterSourceAndFreeSpace: Both water source and work space necessary.
LanguageData.DrawWaterwayFailedNonWaterSource: {0} tried to draw something other than a water source into the waterway. But a foolish attempt ended in failure.
